Piano

Notable performances and relevant pianist stats:

  • Graduation Half-Recital, solo piano [April 2014]
    • Recipient of the William Tritt Recital Prize - awarded to the piano student who has demonstrated the highest level of performance on his/her third year or graduation recital.
  • Participant of the Scotia Festival of Music Young Artist Program [May 2013]
    • Recipient of the Willian Tritt/Scotia Festival Memorial Prize
  • 2012 Nova Scotia Youth Orchestra concerto competition winner. Performed Beethoven piano concerto no.3 in two concerts in April 2013
  • Featured soloist, Beethoven piano concerto no.3, 1st mvt. with Dalhousie Symphony Orchestra, Concerto Night [February 2013]
  • Featured soloist, Grieg piano concerto in a minor, 1st mvt. with Dalhousie Symphony Orchestra, Concerto Night [February 2012]
